name: VR Overt Overlapping Space Escape
description:
For our Master Thesis project in Medialogy, we have created a VR Action-Adventure-style game with simple game mechanics, but implemented in an overtly overlapping environment. This was created for the Oculus Quest, and may not work with other devices! But you are welcome to try it out, as long as you can move around in a 2x2 play area :-)! 

If you have an Oculus device (preferably Quest, we are not sure that it works on others), please download the game and help us test movement methods - completely on your own time! The test is incorporated into the game, so try it out and let us know what you think! If you want to contact us, you are welcome to join our discord: https://discord.gg/SpBears.
